1531.content: Who shall the base be?
1531.title: Tokyo Mew Mew...

15311.content:
You remember back to the old lady you helped yesterday telling you, "With this amulet, all you have to do is dream of your true form and your wishes will come true." Strange, it was, but maybe... nah... You go to watch clips of one of your favorite shows, Tokyo Mew Mew, which has one of your favorite anime characters of all time, Ichigo Motomiya (but you find her cuter in her mahou shojo catgirl form Mew Ichigo), namely comparison videos showing how 4Kids butchered the show, and get carried away LOL'ing at your screen. In fact, you get so carried away in laughing at the absurdity of the localization you fail to notice your body feminizing. Your hairline realigns into a feminine line, as your waist tightens some, and your Adam's Apple shrivels away, but most importantly your genitals suck in, becoming the female equivalent.

Only when you notice your laughter seems much higher than normal that you catch on. "I need to stop giggling... Whoa... my voice..." You scoot your desk chair over to your closet mirror to see that now you appear to be what you'd look like if you were a flat-chested girl with your same haircut. You're a bit cute, but how did this happen... "That amulet!!" You pull up the amulet, and see it burning a strange pink fire, a fire that somehow feels cool and calming.

"That old lady wasn't lying... It seems it started working when I thought about mew Ichigo. Maybe I should try it..." you decide to focus on Mew Ichigo, and began to feel a cute tingling, and will yourself to acquire her...
15311.title: Mew Ichigo...
